com.ibm.team.repository.client.util
Class FormBasedAuth.JazzSessionCookieHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.net.CookieHandler
      com.ibm.team.repository.client.util.FormBasedAuth.JazzSessionCookieHandler
Enclosing class:
FormBasedAuth
public static class FormBasedAuth.JazzSessionCookieHandler
extends java.net.CookieHandler

A cookie handler to deal with Jazz sessionId logins. Note that this is a much simplified handler than is what is called for by the Netscape and subsequent cookie specs. The distinctions:

  • The "domain" attribute of a cookie, if present, is ignored. The assumed domain of a cookie is the hostname of the URL that the cookie is set on. Domains are compared lexicographically; a hostname of "foo", which defaults to the domain of "ibm.com" is a different "domain" than that of "foo.ibm.com".
  • The expires attribute of a cookie is ignored.
  • The secure attribute of a cookie is ignored.
